definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

pinyin: Guo2 ji4 Hai3 shi4 Zu3 zhi1

sentences.english: This paper based on the boiler rebuild project of DaLian Maritime University.
sentences.chinese: 本課題來源於大連海事大學的鍋爐房改建工程。

sentences.english: Naval experts said they were amazed by the collision.
sentences.chinese: 海事專家說他們對這次撞擊很驚訝。

sentences.english: Rules of Arbitration for China Msritime Arbitration Commission.
sentences.chinese: 按中國海事仲裁委員會仲裁規則進行。

sentences.english: The theme of the forum are China standard ship building contracts and maritime arbitration.
sentences.chinese: 本論壇以中國標準造船合同和海事仲裁爲主題。

sentences.english: GE will provide four gas turbine modules per vessel.
sentences.chinese: 通用海事公司將爲每艘艦艇提供四種燃氣輪機模塊。

sentences.english: The establishment of adjudicatory apparatus and administrative offices of the maritime courts shall be decided by the Supreme People's Court.
sentences.chinese: 海事法院對所在地的市人民代表大會常務委員會負責。

sentences.english: A. stands for the Maritime & Coastguard Agency of Britain.
sentences.chinese: 代表英國海事與海岸警衛署。

sentences.english: Approved by the Ministry of Education in 2004 changed its name to Shanghai Maritime University.
sentences.chinese: 2004年經教育部批准更名爲上海海事大學。

sentences.english: Tadao Andos proposal for the Maritime Museum is shaped likeasail.
sentences.chinese: 安藤忠雄設計的形狀類似船帆的海事博物館。

sentences.english: Of course, even that is a compromise IMO.
sentences.chinese: 當然，即使這是一個妥協海事組織。

sentences.english: "Organization" means the International Maritime Satellite Organization (INMARSAT) established by the Convention.
sentences.chinese: “組織”係指按該公約建立的國際海事衛星組織。

sentences.english: He is a non-executive Director of Maritime London.
sentences.chinese: 潘先生是倫敦海事協會非執行董事。

sentences.english: They are in big trouble imo.
sentences.chinese: 他們是大麻煩海事組織。

sentences.english: This division continued to exercise the admiralty jurisdiction.
sentences.chinese: 該分庭一直行使海事管轄權。

sentences.english: "Convention" means the Convention on the International Maritime Satellite Organization (INMARSAT) including its Annex.
sentences.chinese: “公約”係指國際海事衛星組織公約，包括其附件。

sentences.english: Maritime disputes are seen as a dangerous potential flashpoint between east Asia’s pre-eminent powers.
sentences.chinese: 海事爭議被認爲是東亞兩大國之間潛在的危險點。

definition: Zhoushan prefecture level city in Zhejiang (consisting solely of islands)/formerly Dinghai 定海
